about_the_game:
This game called UNCHAINED has appeared mysteriously on the store. What started as an innocent Virtual Desktop is filled with puzzles and digital monstrosities looking for a way out. We don't know hat he's planning, but it could be dange-

HELLO, FRIEND!

My name is Cain, and from now on I'll be your partner in the Digital World while you explore my home. Sounds exciting, right? We're gonna have SO MUCH FUN TOGETHER. I love to solve riddles, and I can interact with your actual computer, now that's cool!

You don't know what the Digital World is?

With the latest technology in digital rendering we can do so many things together: navigate around the Virtual Desktop interacting with various files, enjoy the handmade 2D graphics and play incredibly fun games that hold all sorts of suprises. You can also meet my four good friends ██████, and visit my home.

What's inside my home? 

Each of my friend is living in a different area of the house. You can explore the 3D enviroment and learn how they ended up in there for ever. They're very friendly, and I'm sure they will present fun puzzles for you to survive have a blast. You better come in and find out for yourself, I'm sure it'll be an experience you won't forget😊.

I've changed my mind, I don't want you inside my house.

Get away from it.

content_descriptors.notes: General horror themes and grotesque representations of human and non-human characters.

name: UNCHAINED

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: UNCHAINED is a psychological horror game where you explore an abandoned virtual desktop hiding a terrible secret. The deeper you look into this 2D and 3D experience, the more secrets you'll uncover about the projects that were left behind by the previous owner.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
